sqrt
The function returns the square root of the argument. The return value is a decimal number.
Syntax
sqrt
(number)
Setting
Purpose
number
The number from which the square root is extracted.
Note
The function is called using the
button, located in the Algorithm Editor on the "Arithmetic and boolean" tab.
If a negative number is specified, the System returns an error.
Example
Calculate the square root of 25:
Algorithm result: 5
